structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.text: The following terms, as used in this chapter, shall, unless the context requires otherwise, have the following meanings:-- "Secretary'', the head of an executive office established under section two.[ Definition of "State agency'' effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] "State agency'', any department, office, commission, committee, council, board, division, bureau, institution, officer or other agency within the executive department.[ Definition of "State agency'' as amended by 2012, 165, Sec. 19 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] "State agency'', as defined in section 1 of chapter 29.
